snippet: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner will undergo surgery  to drain an accumulation of blood near her brain resulting from a recent head injury, her doctors said.
abstract: Argentinian Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner's doctors say she will undergo surgery to drain an accumulation of blood near her brain resulting from a head injury.
lead_paragraph: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner will undergo surgery  to drain an accumulation of blood near her brain resulting from a recent head injury, her doctors said.
